column4: i am using gnome right now..i want to try KDE ... is it okay to install both KDE and GNOME at same time.. my ubuntu version is 11.04
yes, you can have both, just don't break one or the other with package removals
its no slower here, and that is with gnome/kde apps going all at once
well i can still try it... i will purge either kde or gnome after that :)
